Diogenes Protocol

Trust procedure, not promises.

Data Rectification Request (Starter)

Subject: Data Rectification Request — [Your Name] — [Account/Reference]

To: [Company / Support / Data Controller]

I request correction of inaccurate personal data held about me.

Identifiers:

  • Name: [Name]
  • Email(s): [Email]
  • Account/Reference: [ID]

Data to correct:

  • Field: [e.g., address / phone / name / date]
  • Current value: [Value]
  • Correct value: [Value]
  • Evidence (if needed): [Describe minimally]

Please confirm in writing when the correction is completed and whether the corrected data has been propagated to processors/third parties where applicable.

Regards, [Name] [Country]
